Uses of Package
fr.epita.quiz_manager.services

  • Packages that use fr.epita.quiz_manager.services 
    Package Description
    fr.epita.quizManager.test  
    fr.epita.quiz_manager.services  
    fr.epita.quiz_manager.web.services  
  • Classes in fr.epita.quiz_manager.services used by fr.epita.quizManager.test 
    Class and Description
    MCQChoiceDAO
    Description This MCQChoiceDAO class is used to manage answers type MCQChoice persisted in the database using queries predefined in the applicationContext Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject private MCQChoiceDAO instance;
    QuestionDAO
    Description This QuestionDAO class is used to manage questions type Question persisted in the database using queries predefined in the applicationContext Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject private QuestionDAO instance;
    QuestionOperationsService
    Description This QuestionOperationsService class is used to provide services: create, update, delete, search for Question object types, it includes 3 fields: @Inject private MCQChoiceDAO instance; @Inject private QuestionDAO instance; @Inject private SessionFactory instance; Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject QuestionOperationsService instance;
    QuizDAO
    Description This QuizDAO class is used to manage objects type Quiz persisted in the database using queries predefined in the applicationContext Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject private QuizDAO instance;
    QuizOperationsService
    Description This QuizOperationsService class is used to provide services create, update, search, delete and searchExcept for Quiz object types, it includes 3 fields: @Inject private QuizDAO instance; @Inject QuestionOperationsService instance; @Inject private SessionFactory instance; Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject QuizOperationsService instance;
    UserOperationsService
    Description This UserOperationsService class is used to provide services: create, update, authenticate, delete, search for User object types, it includes 3 fields: @Inject private UserDAO instance; @Inject private SessionFactory instance; Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject UserOperationsService instance;

    Description This WhereClauseBuilder generic class will provide a bonus ,as it Maps parameters to simplify the queryString generation for each type of class.

    Class and Description
